choices: Back to the big kid toys
1.content:
After getting good grades on you're report card, mom decided to reward you with a toy at the end of each week until school started again.
You get to the Toys'R'us and notice the Babies'R'us beside it.
You get to the aisles and she says
"Ok, go and pick out whatever you want"

Excited you wander the aisles and eventually end up at a hallway connecting the baby section.
1.title: First week at the toy store

11.content:
You decide to wander around the baby furniture aisle.
You notice the cribs on one side,
Highchairs along the back,
And playpens on the other side.

Which do you look at?
11.title: Check the furniture aisle

choices: You decide to try the highchair
You bring mom to see your choice
112.content:
As you look at the highchairs you realize they are surprisingly big.
You see a few different styles.
Do you try to get in one?
Or pick one you like and tell mom?
112.title: Highchairs

1121.content:
You pick a highchair and pull the tray off.
You sit in the seat and strap yourself in.
The tray goes back in easily and clicks as it locks.
Suddenly you realise the latches are out of your reach now.
You start to panic, when...
1121.title: You decide to try the highchair

choices: Agree and skip to the house
11211.content:
Your mom finds you strapped into the highchair and stares in shock for a minute.
"What are you doing?" She asks.

"I wanted to get this highchair, but I didn't know if I would fit" you reply

She looks at you and decides to go another aisle.
A few minutes later she comes back with a pack of large bibs, rubber bowls and spoons.
"You'll need theses if you want to eat in that" She states
11211.title: Your mom finds you

12.content:
You walk down the aisle looking at the baby food, bottles and pacifiers.

You look through the aisle and notice a big set of boxes at the bottom.

The first box with 4 large baby bottles, 4 small baby bottles, 10 nipples of various speeds, and a large can of formula.

The second box with 4 spillproof cups, 4 rubber bowls and spoons, 2 bibs and a plastic placemat.

You choose...
12.title: Check feeding aisle

choices: She is confused, but ignores it
She is angry and replaces your cups
121.content:
You pick the first box with the bottles and carry it back to you're mom.

"I picked out what I want" you state.
You're mom hands picks it up and gets in line, when she gets to the cashier she notices.
"Oh wait, this is..." she mumbles,
Then turn to you and says "Are you sure?"
You knod and she pays for it.
You head home without saying a word...
121.title: The first box

1212.content:
You get home and you're mom stomps into the house with the box you picked.
You hear some rumbling in the kitchen and see your mom carrying a box down to the basement.

She comes back up and brings you to the kitchen by the arm.
"There you go! Now anytime you want a drink just let me know and I'll make you a bottle!" She said almost cheerful.

You see the cupboard cleaned out and the bottles, nipples, and formula organized where the cups once were.
1212.title: She is angry and replaces your cups

12121.content:
You pause for a moment and look at your mom. "Can I get a drink then?" You ask.
She's a little surprised but quickly picks out a large bottle and fills it with water and formula powder.
She shakes it and hands it to you.
"Enjoy!" She smirks

The rest of the week is very similar and you get used to the new routine.
12121.title: Ask for a bottle

121211.content:
Back to the toy store,
"Ok, go pick something" she says

You wander and get to the hallway again, and decide to check out the furniture section.

You notice a highchair section, a crib section and a stroller section.
121211.title: Week 2 - At the toy store

choices: No actually, I liked the pink crib
1212112.content:
You look at the cribs, and head back to your mom.
"Mom! Come with me, I need your help deciding" you say

She follows you and you point at a couple cribs.
"Really? You need my help deciding which Crib?" She says.
She gives you an angry look and wanders over to a pink frilly crib with bows all over it.
"Why not get this one?" She says sarcastically
Then to a blue and grey crib you had pointed to.
"Alright fine! This one looks sturdy and easy to open"
1212112.title: Pick a Crib

12121121.content:
Your mom bring the assistant over and tells her which crib we picked.
"Oh! Good timing, we're having a 'buy one get one free' Sale, feel free to pick out any changing tables or highchairs and let me know!" The assistant replies

Mom points at the large changing table and the assistant rolls out 2 big boxes on a flat cart. We get to the checkout and load up the car.
12121121.title: To the checkout

121211211.content:
Mom gets you to help unload and set up both the changing table and the crib in your room. She takes the old bed, frame and dressers.

"Alright! Why don't you try it out?" She says
She lowers the side and helps you into the crib, then lifts the side up until it locks. She hands you sheets and a pillow.
"All set! I'll be back" she says.
Mom turns off the light and closes the door.
121211211.title: To the house

1212112111.content:
You decide to nap while she is gone.

Suddenly you wake up as the lights shine brightly on your face.
"I'm back, I noticed a theme here so I got a few things you'll be needing" mom states.

She places 2 boxes of diapers next to the changing table and swaps out the closet with baby style clothing.
She fills the changing table with pacifiers, bonets and creams/wipes.

"Time for a change!" She states
1212112111.title: An hour later

choices: Week 3 - back at the toy store
12121121111.content:
Mom gets you out of the crib and onto the changing table.
She undressed you and sticks a pacifier in your mouth.
She lifts you by the ankles and diapers you.
Mom lifts you off the changing table and dressed you in a footed sleeper.

She hands you a bottle and heads to the kitchen.
12121121111.title: Diapered and dressed

121211211111.content:
After a week of being diapered, changed and dressed you are back at the store.

This time she parks on the other side and leads you to the Babies'R'us entrance.

She leads you to the furniture aisle and has you try different highchairs until she finds one that fits.
"Go and pick something" mom says.

You head into the aisle and notice a breast pump. Your mom catches up to you and notices what you're looking at.
"Are you thinking of getting that?" She asks.

You think about it and notice a set underneath with 2 pumps, 2 nursing bras and a large bottle of milk supplements. You point at it and she adds it to the cart.
121211211111.title: Week 3 - back at the toy store

1212112111111.content:
Your mom sets up the highchair and sits you in it for supper.
You are given a bottle and notice your mom with multiple jars of baby food.
She quickly spoons it into your mouth and steadily fills your mouth with different mushy flavors.
She wipes your face and hands you another bottle.
You drink it as you watch her take her shirt and bra off, then pump both of her breasts. Slowly and steady by the end of the week she is pumping a few ounces a day.
1212112111111.title: Back home

12121121111111.content:
Mom is pumping every day for almost a month.
You go to the kitchen expecting a bottle when mom picks you up and lays you across her lap.
"I think its time you get used to the boob" she states and firmly presses her nipple into your mouth.
"Push your lips againts my nipple and suck just like your bottle" she instructs you.
You suck and latch on, gulping down her breastmilk. She rocks you and strokes your hair as you drain her breast and feel the other nipple forming a puddle on your lap.
She flips you over and firmly holds your lips on her nipple.
You quickly latch on again and drain her again.

Every meal turned into spoonfeeding baby food and long breastfeeding sessions. Mom soon had you as dependant as a newborn.

She got everything a baby could need and continued to spoil you as a baby.

After the summer ended you were taken out of school for the year and placed in daycare instead.
12121121111111.title: Two weeks later

12121122.content:
Actually, I think it's kind of cute, you say as you turn beet red.

Really? she responds, I was only kind of kidding, but...

She thinks for a moment, but eventually her female desires to see how cute you'd be in it overtake her

OK, let's do it, but I might need to get you some other things as well
12121122.title: No actually, I liked the pink crib

121211222.content: She walks over to the diaper aisle and picks out some girls diapers with images of Minnie Mouse on them. Once again, you're beet red, but the thought of wearing them does get you a bit excited. Your Mom seems to pick up on this, and smiles as she places them in the cart.
121211222.title: Some pink girls diapers

info.brief_description: Going to the toy store with mom gives you an array of new ideas.
info.description:
You're mom brings you to Toys'R'us at the end of the week and you pick out something from the baby section each week.

NO Shrinking/Vore allowed!
Feel free to ask fro extra paths!
Enjoy!
